titleStmt.title: At the court at Hampton-Court, June 29. 1662. Whereas by an Act of Parliament in the twelfth year of his Majesties reign, entituled, An act for the encouraging and increasing of shipping and navigation of this nation...

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
List of those present follows caption title.

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
